message.title: Welcome to Mozilla VPN 2.11
message.subtitle: You’re using the latest version of Mozilla VPN. Take a look at the newest features and updates:

content.content: If you have enabled “Connect VPN on startup” on desktop, the app will now launch minimized whenever you start your computer.
We’ve made bug fixes, UI adjustments and performance improvements to make Mozilla VPN even better.

blocks.content: Thank you for installing the latest version of Mozilla VPN!
